title: How to describe dance as an art - Quora

response.answer_text: Art comes down to expression, hard work, and being able to use one’s ‘media’ to communicate. Hence Dance fits all those key points. Its media is the human body, along with any costuming and such, as used with rhythm, posing and timing, to communicate and express ‘something’. The ability to execute a dance is due to hard work - practice and lots of exercises.
Dance is an individual creative expression utilizing the body (or any apparatus that aids or guides your movement), mind and soul mixed with timing.
